content: this legal text explains the progress of a case involving two companies referred to as ft di tr e c snc and t 2 g snc di gge e ggi these companies jointly acquired a plot of land in castelfidardo italy which is registered in the land registry and measures 2899 square meters they are currently constructing an artisanal warehouse on the plot following a building permit issued by the municipality of castelfidardo the warehouse consists of two real estate units the parties have agreed to terminate their joint ownership and divide the property into two shares the first share owned by ft di tr e c snc includes the ground floor and exclusive courtyard of the building the second share owned by t 2 g snc di gge e ggi includes another portion of the ground floor and exclusive courtyard each share has a value of euro 9221500
